attributes.action: Ban the British Association for Shooting & Conservation (BASC) and other bloodsports organisations from  schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the PM  to instruct the Secretary of State for Education to mandate that BASC and other organisations that promote barbaric bloodsports should be prevented from visiting schools.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the British Association for Shooting & Conservation (BASC) and other bloodsports organisations from schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17714


Prime Minister's Office
